bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding the information displayed on a noncommercial motor vehicle license plate.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding the information displayed on a noncommercial motor vehicle license plate. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-5 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Beginning on January 1, 2006, no number plates authorized by § 32-5-82 nor the distinctive number on the plates as provided by § 32-5-84 may be designed and produced to give any indication as to the county in which the license plates are issued. Section 2. That chapter 32-5 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The Division of Motor Vehicles shall establish a procedure to randomly distribute among the counties of the state any number plates that are produced pursuant to § 32-5-84 from July 1, 2003, to December 31, 2005, inclusive, so that the county of issuance may not be identified by any number appearing on the plates. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
